body_html:
I just got bitten by this. The way that it's mentioned in the doc is very easy to overlook, considering that updating these manually is critical for use, and the note font is smaller than any other on the page...

It would be great to have these updated internally by default, providing an option to update manually if desired.

body:
I just got bitten by this.  The way that it's mentioned in the doc is very easy to overlook, considering that updating these manually is critical for use, and the note font is smaller than any other on the page...

It would be great to have these updated internally by default, providing an option to update manually if desired.
